com.barrybecker4.common.i18n
Class MessageContext

java.lang.Object
  com.barrybecker4.common.i18n.MessageContext

public final class MessageContext
extends java.lang.Object

Manage access to localized message bundles. When creating an instance specify the paths to the resource bundles to use.

getLabel

public java.lang.String getLabel(java.lang.String key)
Look first in the common message bundle. If not found there, look in the application specific bundle if there is one.

Parameters:
key - the message key to find in resource bundle.
Returns:
the localized message label

getLabel

public java.lang.String getLabel(java.lang.String key,
                                 java.lang.Object[] params)
Look first in the common message bundle. If not found there, look in the application specific bundle if there is one.

Parameters:
key - the message key to find in resource bundle.
params - typically a list of string sto use a parameters to the template defined by the message from key.
Returns:
the localized message label

getLocale

public LocaleType getLocale(java.lang.String name,
                            boolean finf)
Looks up an LocaleType for a given locale name.

Parameters:
finf - fail if not found.
Returns:
locale the name of a local. Something like ENGLISH, GERMAN, etc
Throws:
java.lang.Error - if the name is not a member of the enumeration
